pr_title: Log normalised full statement in Redis instrumentations

timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: It's no longer needed - I changed the method matcher so that exactly one method matches; previously there were 2 or 3 methods that got matched.
replies.author: mateuszrzeszutek

timeline.bodyText: Can args be List<Object>? This would eliminate this stream and thus extra allocations.
timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.message: Log only command in redis span names

timeline.bodyText: can we extract constant for new byte[0][] to avoid allocating each time?
timeline.author: trask

timeline.message: Log normalised full statement in Redis instrumentations (jedis, lettuce, redisson)
Use List<?> for command args to avoid unnecessary allocation
Log only command in redis span names
